ai-patthana16.17:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.17:1.1_0: Though a wholesome quality doesn’t give rise to a skillful quality.
ai-patthana16.17:1.1_1: Though a wholesome quality doesn’t give rise to a skillful quality, conditions are wrong.
ai-patthana16.17:1.1_2: Though a wholesome quality doesn’t arise in someone who does not conceive the Teaching.
ai-patthana16.17:1.1_3: Thoughts that are skillful and unskillful, nor out of the teaching, they don’t arise because of an incompetent reason.
ai-patthana16.17:1.1_4: Thoughts that are skillful and unskillful, nor are they because of the unskillful and blameworthy and blamelessness.
ai-patthana16.17:2.1_0: Unskillful thoughts don’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.17:2.1_1: Unskillful thoughts don’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.17:2.1_2: Unskillful thoughts don’t give rise to unsullied intentions.
ai-patthana16.17:2.1_3: Unskillfulness arises in mind, and doesn’t arise because of that.
ai-patthana16.17:2.1_4: Unskillfulness arises in mind, and doesn’t arise because of these five reasons.
ai-patthana16.17:3.1_1: Though an indeterminate principle doesn’t give rise to unprofitable teaching.
ai-patthana16.17:3.1_2: intentionally don’t arise in oneself, or with unprofitable intentions don’t arise because of what is skillful and what is unskillful.
ai-patthana16.17:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.17:5.1_0: ‘In fact ...’ when you haven’t escaped from nine grounds ...
